NOHO.HE.summary: NoHo Partners Oyj, together with its subsidiaries, engages in production and provision of restaurant services. The company's restaurant concepts include Elite, Savoy, Teatteri, Yes Yes Yes, Stefan's Steakhouse, Palace, LÃ¶yly, Hanko Sushi, Friends & Brgrs, and Cock's & Cows. As of February 18, 2021, it operated approximately 230 food restaurants, nightclubs and entertainment, fast casual restaurants, and international restaurants in Finland, Denmark, and Norway. The company was formerly known as Restamax Oyj and changed its name to NoHo Partners Oyj in December 2018. NoHo Partners Oyj was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Tampere, Finland.
